Hey Phil,

This is the output. All the things are there.

-WebArchiving:~$ echo $HERITRIX_HOME
/home/umanda/Heritrix3.1.0/heritrix-3.1.0

ls latr $HERITRIX_HOME
ls: cannot access latr: No such file or directory
/home/umanda/Heritrix3.1.0/heritrix-3.1.0:
adhoc.keystore  extras              heritrix.pid  LICENSE_DeDuplicator.txt
bin             heritrix_dmesg.log  jobs          LICENSE.txt
conf            heritrix_out.log    lib           README.txt


-WebArchiving:~$ ls latr $HERITRIX_HOME/binls
: cannot access latr: No such file or directory
/home/umanda/Heritrix3.1.0/heritrix-3.1.0/bin:
arcreader         extractor                heritrix       htmlextractor.cmd
arcreader.cmd     extractor.cmd            heritrix.cmd   make_reports.pl
dedupdigest    foreground_heritrix      hoppath.pl     manifest_bundle.pl
dependencies.xsl  foreground_heritrix.cmd  htmlextractor  xdocToTxt.xsl
